name: Bounce Again
description:
Bounce Again is inspired by some board games like Monopoly or Aeroplane Chess, while the movements in those games are decided by the Roll of the Dice instead of the player’s will.

They are usually block-based, and different blocks have different functions (some are good and some are bad). I try to apply this random and uncontrollable system to a 2D Platformer, which brings me this game.

For Playing in the Browser

Please make sure the “use hardware acceleration” option in the browser settings is turned on.

Please click the blue button to enter the Full-Screen Mode.

Credits

Music 2 - 8 Bit Arcade By Pianino
